Articles.Content:
Apparently KSP (Win64-bit version) does not like being put in the background behind Skype. I did so (Alt-Tab) and ended up with a crash. According to the logs, it has something to do with the "HandleD3DDeviceLost", which makes sense... my laptop has two graphics processors, an embedded Intel and a Nvidia Geforce, and yea they auto-switch. Anyone else experience this yet (be it with Skype or whatever)?

Mods, feel free to move this wherever you believe it belongs.
Out of curiosity have you tried changing the video settings to only use one card for everything?

Yea, I would go into the BIOS and disable the integrated graphics.

You can also just run KSP in borderless-windowed mode by adding -popupwindow to the launch options.
Looks like support would be the best place for this. Good luck with it.

I have the system set so KSP uses the Nvidia card, everything else auto-switches; I'd set that card as the system-wide default, but I've got some other things which behave odd when I do.

I run KSP full screen, at 1920x1080. I very rarely Alt-Tab out... this was just of those times I did.
